metadata.name: The Endings 001

attributes.value: When Tears Are In Your Eyes

metadata.description:
The Endings is a best-selling book of photography, shot by Caitlin Cronenberg and art directed by Jessica Ennis, originally published in 2018 by Chronicle Books as a physical book of photography.

Now available as a ground-breaking, fully interactive photography book NFT, The Endings NFT Book uses blockchain technology to maximize the potential of a book of photography and allow the viewer to become a part of the creative process.

Click or tap each page to move through the book

The table of contents is linked for easy browsing

Shift + R returns you to the table of contents

Click ‘View Extras' to see behind-the-scenes content

Click ‘View NFTs' to see existing The Endings 1/1 NFTs

Reload your browser to bring you back to the cover

[View Fullscreen](https://theendings.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/QmQj1u7mksFznTMcaMuCDF5ugrwF5fiabF7xUkj7CMvbdy/TheEndings001.html)
